articles.description: The publicity-shy designer was uncompromising on high quality clothing and counted NSW Premier Gladys Berejiklian as a loyal customer.
articles.content:
Ms Berejiklian described Thomas as "an icon and trailblazer in Australian fashion".
"Our deepest condolences to her loved ones," she said. "I was and remain a huge fan of her sense of style and conf… [+2068 chars]
